title: Exercise 2-8: Stable and Unstable Scale Degrees
description: Write out the stable, unstable, and leading tone scale degrees from major scales with two key signatures. Label them.

title: Exercise 2-9: Tonic Triads
description: Build tonic triads (T53) in the indicated keys.

title: Exercise 2-10: Leading Tones
description: Surround the tonics of various keys with leading tones and indicate their resolution with arrows.

title: Exercise 2-11: Note Resolution
description: Resolve the given notes in the indicated keys.

title: Exercise 2-12: Scale Degree Elaboration
description: Create elaborations of stable scale degrees with unstable ones following the given pattern.
